A great and inspiring hymn it is.
One of my favourite songs. Woke up this morning thats the song which came first to my head. I need God's washing every day.

Never heard this hymn before but it's #99 of 100 Inspirational Hymns CD I was listening to between yesterday and today. Praise God. I will now add it to my favourite list and learn the music. God bless you.

Thank you for the lyrics to Whiter than Snow and the music!! A perfect prayer from me to Yeshua at the close of this Day of Atonement. We appreciate your website. May you and your family be blessed in a special way.

We thank You Lord for Your endless love. It is us that need You; but yet You care for our eternal life so much, that You wanted to initiate the eternal relationship with Your sacrifice. We love You LORD! The Lord is #1 and then everything follows.

Yes, thank you very much for providing this website. Whiter Than Snow has always been one of my most favorite hymns, and as Day Of Atonement is fast approaching it truly does has special meaning in this time of cleansing my soul. My Yahweh make us all completely WHOLE! HalleluYah! Shalom!

What a blessed joy to see that you have thought enough to share the peace that God gives us through this song. Now my hubby and I can have background music when we do our morning and evening worship. Thanks for sharing, He's coming back really soon.
As I fight my demons and reading through Eph 4:11-15 this song came through for me in my morning devotions at work and I had to google it. Thanks for the website.

While reading the cry of David's heart in PS 25 it is the cry of my heart today, and while talking with God He brought this precious song to my mind ... I am thankful I found your website to have all of the words and to be able to sing along with the music as my prayer to God. Thank you.
Singing to the Lord blesses my soul.
